oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: Explanation of various personal names was given, in the Katkop dialect, by Díä!kwãin (L V.
5607). Dia!kwain's explanation of the name his mother gave him after her family was roughly beaten by people who she thought showed no pity.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dia!kwain's explanation of the name which his mother gave him
